description:
沪江英乐：瑞典爆红 DJ Avicii新单《Addicted To You》！亡命天涯的不一定是雌雄大盗，还有可能是超杀拉拉。油门一踩，她带她离开了那昏暗的小酒馆，在茫茫雪地之上，她们用疯狂抢掠书写了一段无人会信的离奇人生。

【瑞典爆红DJ Avicii新单《Addicted To You》】

歌词：

[Verse 1]
I don't know just how it happened,
I let down my guard.
Swore I'd never fall in love again but I fell hard.
Guess I should have seen it coming,
Caught me by surprise.
I wasn't looking where i was going,
I fell into your eyes.
You came into my crazy world,
Like a cool and cleansing grace.
Before I knew what hit me baby,
You were flowing though my veins.

[Chorus]
I'm addicted to you,
Hooked on your love,
Like a powerful drug
I can't get enough of.
Lost in your eyes,
Drowning in blue
I'm outta control,
What can I do?
I'm addicted to you!

[Verse 2]
When night blows in through the window,
Dances 'round the room.
Got me hypnotized,
I'm getting high on the perfume.
I couldn't live without you now,
Oh, I know I'd go insane,
I wouldn't last one night alone baby,
I couldn't stand the pain!

[Chorus]
